channel.title: Degeneration Radio
channel.description: This is a comedy show with no restrictions. Unlike conventional types of radio we are completely uncensored. We discuss technology, sports (including racing), and just make fun of everyone and everything. Listen and enjoy content free of political correctness and restrictions. Follow us on Twitter: @degenerateradio or @rickyradio We can also be found in the iTunes store by searching Degeneration Radio and please rate us. leave a voice mail here +1 (803) 993-8253 thats +1 (803) 99-FUCK-3
channel.itunes:subtitle: Click play to listen or download to listen later on your computer or mobile device

item.title: Happy Frigign New Year
item.description: Me and the thunder down under would like to wish you a happy new year! And thunder also teases some good ol' fashion snowwoman sex.
item.dc:creator: Degeneration Radio with JP and Ricky
item.itunes:summary: Me and the thunder down under would like to wish you a happy new year! And thunder also teases some good ol' fashion snowwoman sex.

item.title: Degeneration Radio October 10, 2011
item.description: We're back for our 4th year! We take a stroll down memory lane about the good ol days talking about old friends from the "Get It Off Your Chest" show. We discuss our dreams and it leads to some "fun" conversations. We also discuss a man putting his seed in a lucky ladys yogurt,Steve Jobs,and stereotype the Asian people! All on this craptastic edition of Degeneration Radio!

item.title: Update
item.description:
Okay so we are now officially on hiatus until Sept. 12th so Jazzy and Ricky jump on and talk about hella horny yet shy girls and a little about food, drugs and rock and roll and gay people randomly trying to fuck ya.
We have a few changes coming that we will announce on that show. In the meantime check out an awesome band Ricky saw live Friday night out of Savanna, GA: http://www.fureliseband.com/ In the meantime follow us on twitter: JP: http://www.twitter.com/degenerateradio and Ricky: http://www.twitter.com/rickyradio and Jazzy's awesome boner/cringe inducing tumblr page: http://degenerateradio.tumblr.com/ for continued content and show updates. Seeya in a few weeks!

item.title: Degeneration Radio August 22, 2011
item.description: JP Here! No idea what they talked about in the first hour..or second hour..i don't f'in know! But in the hour where i am on we discuss ESPN and it's failures in recent years with it's NASCAR coverage.Little League World Series,sports radio and how far peoples priorities have fallen based on twitter! Download us,like the show on Podomatic,write us a review on iTunes! Thanks for listening!

Download us,like the show on Podomatic,write us a review on iTunes! Thanks for listening!

item.title: Degeneration Radio August 15, 2011
item.description: The show continues through our "break". This time Thunder Down Under joins the show to do what else? Flirt with our 3rd mic girl. JP breaks in our new co-host in with what JP calls the best thing on the internet.....we are not so sure. Speaking of not being sure Thunder Down Under makes one hell of a clap.......kidding this isn't that kind of a comedy show....ehhh....Thunder Down Under finds a way to make JP uncomfortable in one ball clinching 30 minutes of "Holy shit I hope I brought a napkin" radio. Later the producer/announcer of the Offensive TV Network comes on to give us some of what to expect. We have a feeling this network won't be alive long nor will anyone associated with it. Uninentional gay moments and a lot more.....Just download it already.

item.title: Degeneration Radio August 6, 2011
item.description: The unofficial hiatus show continues through summer with Ricky and Jazzy. On this show: how Jazzy is into a lot of guy stuff. Age of consent and related subjects like stripping were brought up. What is best the part of going to a strip club?...the Food duh. Food talk continues briefly that'll make you hungry and blow your diet while listening to us. To fix that the image of 'water fall period' will be in your head after hearing this. To fix that sex talk. Small or big? What you would do if you could hide your identity and JP joins the show and discusses his marathon of hell catching up on Harry Potter

item.title: Degeneration Radio June 20, 2011 Bonus show
item.description: TV talk. Shows you're tired of and you have a feeling the writers are just as tired of it as you are. And we talk about what else?...a monorail!! Also discussed good comedies that take a long time to get into. Chicks being into gay guys. Speaking of gay Ricky and Jazzy talk about fashion trends and most importantly we find out if our 3rd mic girl takes it in the ass. Speaking of ass, farts that fill a room.....Thanks everyone for checking out the show. Follow us on twitter: @degenerateradio @rickyradio and @ms_spermbank or call the show anytime at: (803) 993-8253
